response.original_title: Tales from Soda Island: The Neon Jungle
response.overview: Tales from Soda Island is an animated Virtual Reality series created for Oculus TV. It is produced by Studio Syro and is made entirely in Quill by Smoothstep. The series takes place on a bizarre musical island designed by Funilab and is based on the music by the Soda Island music collective. Nick Ladd served as a lead Quill animator and technical artist on the project.
response.title: Tales from Soda Island: The Neon Jungle
